Translations.Text: Praacuryara pratiyogitaya tomalokaka amanoyogi karai raakhiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba
Akau ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba
Ketiya'o nahaya, yadi tomaloke niscitabharae janilahemtena
Akau, niscaya tomaloke iyaka patiyana yoraakai dekhiba
Tara pichata se'idina arasya'i tomalokaka niyamata samparke prasna karaa haâ€™ba
